titles: Puss my aple against thy mouse jle lay ...
notes: "An engraving representing a monkey and a cat playing at cards; with descriptive verses denouncing card-playing." -Thomason catalogue.
Verse: "Puss my aple gainst thy mouse ile lay" ...
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Card games --  Moral and ethical aspects --  Early works to 1800.
